Text: Why post a torrent of free software, and it's not even the current version? DUMB!

You do not want to use the alpha release for stability issues, as found here. 

http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi

This is the latest working stable release. Any releases below this have Windows exploits that are known, any releases above this is in alpha stage. 

And for some, this is where the browse for software, others live in countries where they are not allowed to download the software, others say its faster to download here (especially some linux distro's). If this isn't something your interested in just keep browsing.
Supply the original MD5 and we might consider
